name: Almond Green Beans
comments: This is a wow recipe for green beans, and goes great with my steak and mashed potatoes recipes for a nice formal meal. I do not recommend buying whole almonds and chopping them into chunks, as opposed to sliced; the texture is not near as nice. Spend the extra pennies on this one!
ingredients: 1/4 c. butter, cubed for faster melting
1 1/4 lbs. fresh or frozen green beans, trimmed
instructions: Melt butter in large skillet; add bouillon, celery seed and pepper. Stir in the beans; cover and cook over medium heat for 9-11 minutes or until crisp-tender. Stir occasionally.
Stir in soy sauce and almonds; sprinkle with salt and serve.
